name: Unext
description: At UNext, we make learning perpetual and on-the-go with our powerful AI-powered platform - Lumen - and the social learning app - Epic.U. From breaking down complex content to byte-sized educational pieces and AI Professor for assistance to collaborative spaces to discuss, learn, code, test, and view recordings, we just made learning fun and truly immersive with our learner engagement tools. Ideal for both individual learners and enterprise professionals, now develop capabilities and expertise in the most personalized ways.

Highlights.name: Lumen: An AI-powered Mobile-first Learning Platform
Highlights.description: Lumen is a mobile-first, AI-enabled platform that allows learners to study anywhere, anytime and provides an interactive, personalized and unique learning experience.

Highlights.name: Epic.U: A Unique Social Networking App For Students
Highlights.description: Epic.U, our community networking app, is a next-gen social learning platform where learners across geographies can interact and share thoughts through weekly meet ups and challenges.

Highlights.name: TalentNext: Our Advanced Online Assessment Platform
Highlights.description: TalentNext is an all-in-one, customizable platform that provides end-to-end technology-led assessment solutions, redefining recruitment intelligence and campus hiring.

enhanced_description: Unext offers cutting-edge AI-powered learning solutions, primarily through its Lumen platform and Epic.U social learning app. Lumen is an AI-enabled, mobile-first platform designed for interactive and personalized learning, enabling 'anywhere, anytime' study. Epic.U functions as a community networking app, fostering social learning through collaborative spaces for discussion, coding, testing, and viewing recordings, along with weekly meetups and challenges. The platform excels at breaking down complex content into byte-sized educational pieces and provides an AI Professor for assistance, making learning immersive and engaging. Unext also includes TalentNext, an advanced, customizable online assessment platform offering end-to-end technology-led solutions for recruitment intelligence and campus hiring. Ideal for both individual learners and enterprise professionals, Unext focuses on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency with robust online programs in emerging technologies and a strong emphasis on hands-on learning.
